Class GsonVariablesSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.api.aws.GsonVariablesSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphQLRequest.VariablesSerializer

    public final class GsonVariablesSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphQLRequest.VariablesSerializer
    Implementation of a GraphQL Request serializer for the variables map using Gson.
